metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents manually created
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales billing documents manually created") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents manually created using a custom transaction
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales billing documents manually created using a custom transaction") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents manually created using transaction VF01
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales billing documents manually created using transaction VF01") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents manually created using transaction VF04
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales billing documents manually created using transaction VF04") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents created for internal trading partners
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Sales billing documents created for internal trading partners") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents created from delivery-related billing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Sales billing documents created from delivery-related billing") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents created from order-related billing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Sales billing documents created from order-related billing") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents created from periodic billing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Sales billing documents created from periodic billing") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents canceled
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales billing documents canceled") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents canceled and FI-AR item not cleared
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales billing documents canceled and FI-AR item not cleared") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents not yet transferred to FI
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales billing documents not yet transferred to FI") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents with zero net value and no accounting document
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Sales billing documents with zero net value and no accounting document") * 100

metrics.name: Payment terms different in billing document and FI-AR
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Payment terms different in billing document and FI-AR") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR document reversed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR document reversed") * 100

metrics.name: Sales billing documents manually released to FI
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales billing documents manually released to FI") * 100

metrics.name: Open FI-AR items with dunning block
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open FI-AR items with dunning block") * 100

metrics.name: Open FI-AR items already dunned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open FI-AR items already dunned") * 100

metrics.name: Open and overdue FI-AR items
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open and overdue FI-AR items") * 100

metrics.name: Open and overdue FI-AR items despite offered discount
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open and overdue FI-AR items despite offered discount") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared after net due date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR items cleared after net due date") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items previously dunned are cleared
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR items previously dunned are cleared") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared with manual payment posting transaction FBZ1
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR items cleared with manual payment posting transaction FBZ1") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared with account maintenance transaction FB1D
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR items cleared with account maintenance transaction FB1D") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR clearing items entered with clearing date in the future
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR clearing items entered with clearing date in the future") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR clearing items entered with clearing date more than 3 days in the past
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR clearing items entered with clearing date more than 3 days in the past") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared with discount applied
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - FI-AR items cleared with discount applied") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared without offered discount
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR items cleared without offered discount") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared after net due date but with discount applied
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AR items cleared after net due date but with discount applied") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AR items created") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AR items created")

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AR items cleared") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AR items cleared (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AR items cleared")

metrics.name: Prepare order-related debit memo
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Prepare order-related debit memo')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Prepare periodic billing debit memo
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Prepare periodic billing debit memo')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Prepare debit memo via billing interface')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
